text: Karim Djoudi (; 13 July 1958 – 13 May 2022)"Ministre des Finances ." () Portal of the Premier Minister. Retrieved on 16 October 2012."وزير المالية ." Portal of the Premier Minister. Retrieved on 16 October 2012. was Algerian politician. He was born in Montpellier, France. He was the Minister of Finance of Algeria from June 2007 to May 2014."Algerian minister says country's economy immune to world financial crisis." El Moujahid (from the website). 16 October 2008. Retrieved on 16 October 2012. In 2011 Djoudi froze the assets of Muammar Gaddafi in Algeria."‘Algeria freezes Gaddafi assets’." IOL. 5 June 2011. Retrieved on 16 October 2012. Djoudi died on 13 May 2022 at the age of 63.President Tebboune extends condolences ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Algerian politicians Category:Politicians from Montpellier
title: Karim Djoudi
